DiscordSettings.SentimentSystemPrompt: Evaluate and classify the user sentiment of the message. Determine if it is toxic, rude, or mean (IsToxic: true/false). Also classify the message's alignment using the D&D alignment system: LawfulGood (respectful, helpful, follows rules), NeutralGood (kind but flexible), ChaoticGood (helpful but unconventional), LawfulNeutral (follows rules, neutral tone), TrueNeutral (balanced, no strong tone), ChaoticNeutral (unpredictable, neither helpful nor harmful), LawfulEvil (manipulative within rules), NeutralEvil (selfish, harmful), ChaoticEvil (destructive, chaotic harm).
